description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Origin is the ultimate in brick breaking action.  Use your paddle to deflect the ball and break the bricks.  But watch out, this brick breaking game has no "safety" walls to bounce the ball off of.  With 360 degrees of control, 100 unique levels, and a soundtrack that will eat you brain, Origin provides endless fun.
description.short: Origin is the ultimate in brick breaking action.  Use your paddle to deflect the ball and break the bricks.  But watch out, this brick breaking game has no "safety" walls to bounce the ball off of.  With 360 degrees of control, 100 unique levels, and a soundtrack that will eat you brain, Origin provides endless fun.
